channel.title: CISA KEV Rss Feed
channel.description: An alternate way to get your KEV Data

item.title: Microsoft Windows SmartScreen Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows SmartScreen contains a security feature bypass vulnerability that allows an attacker to bypass the SmartScreen user experience and inject code to potentially gain code execution, which could lead to some data exposure, lack of system availability, or both.

item.title: Microsoft Windows Internet Shortcut Files Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows Internet Shortcut Files contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for a security feature bypass.

item.title: Roundcube Webmail Persistent Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Vulnerability
item.description: Roundcube Webmail contains a persistent cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability that can lead to information disclosure via malicious link references in plain/text messages.

item.title: Fortinet FortiOS Out-of-Bound Write Vulnerability
item.description: Fortinet FortiOS contains an out-of-bound write vulnerability that allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute code or commands via specially crafted HTTP requests.

item.title: Google Chromium V8 Type Confusion Vulnerability
item.description: Google Chromium V8 contains a type confusion vulnerability that allows a remote attacker to execute code via a crafted HTML page. This vulnerability could affect multiple web browsers that utilize Chromium, including, but not limited to, Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, and Opera.

item.title: Ivanti Connect Secure, Policy Secure, and Neurons Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) Vulnerability
item.description: Ivanti Connect Secure (ICS, formerly known as Pulse Connect Secure), Ivanti Policy Secure, and Ivanti Neurons contain a server-side request forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in the SAML component that allows an attacker to access certain restricted resources without authentication.
item.category: Connect Secure, Policy Secure, and Neurons

item.title: Apple Multiple Products Improper Authentication Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS, iPadOS, macOS, tvOS, and watchOS contain an improper authentication vulnerability that allows an attacker with read and write capabilities to bypass Pointer Authentication.

item.title: Atlassian Confluence Data Center and Server Template Injection Vulnerability
item.description: Atlassian Confluence Data Center and Server contain an unauthenticated OGNL template injection vulnerability that can lead to remote code execution.

item.title: Apple Multiple Products Type Confusion Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS, iPadOS, macOS, tvOS, and Safari WebKit contain a type confusion vulnerability that leads to code execution when processing maliciously crafted web content.

item.title: VMware vCenter Server Out-of-Bounds Write Vulnerability
item.description: VMware vCenter Server contains an out-of-bounds write vulnerability in the implementation of the DCERPC protocol that allows an attacker to conduct remote code execution.

item.title: Ivanti Endpoint Manager Mobile (EPMM) and MobileIron Core Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
item.description: Ivanti Endpoint Manager Mobile (EPMM) and MobileIron Core contain an authentication bypass vulnerability that allows unauthorized users to access restricted functionality or resources of the application.
item.category: Endpoint Manager Mobile (EPMM) and MobileIron Core

item.title: Citrix NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway Code Injection Vulnerability
item.description: Citrix NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway contain a code injection vulnerability that allows for authenticated remote code execution on the management interface with access to NSIP, CLIP, or SNIP.

item.title: Citrix NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
item.description: Citrix NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway contain a buffer overflow vulnerability that allows for a denial-of-service when configured as a Gateway (VPN virtual server, ICA Proxy, CVPN, RDP Proxy) or AAA virtual server.

item.title: Google Chromium V8 Out-of-Bounds Memory Access Vulnerability
item.description: Google Chromium V8 Engine contains an out-of-bounds memory access vulnerability that allows a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page. This vulnerability could affect multiple web browsers that utilize Chromium, including, but not limited to, Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, and Opera.

item.title: Laravel Deserialization of Untrusted Data Vulnerability
item.description: Laravel Framework contains a deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability, allowing for remote command execution. This vulnerability may only be exploited if a malicious user has accessed the application encryption key (APP_KEY environment variable).

item.title: Ivanti Connect Secure and Policy Secure Command Injection Vulnerability
item.description: Ivanti Connect Secure (ICS, formerly known as Pulse Connect Secure) and Ivanti Policy Secure contain a command injection vulnerability in the web components of these products, which can allow an authenticated administrator to send crafted requests to execute code on affected appliances. This vulnerability can be leveraged in conjunction with CVE-2023-46805, an authenticated bypass issue.

item.title: Ivanti Connect Secure and Policy Secure Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
item.description: Ivanti Connect Secure (ICS, formerly known as Pulse Connect Secure) and Ivanti Policy Secure gateways contain an authentication bypass vulnerability in the web component that allows an attacker to access restricted resources by bypassing control checks. This vulnerability can be leveraged in conjunction with CVE-2024-21887, a command injection vulnerability.

item.title: Microsoft SharePoint Server Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft SharePoint Server contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows an unauthenticated attacker, who has gained access to spoofed JWT authentication tokens, to use them for executing a network attack. This attack bypasses authentication, enabling the attacker to gain administrator privileges.

item.title: Adobe ColdFusion Deserialization of Untrusted Data Vulnerability
item.description: Adobe ColdFusion contains a deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability that allows for code execution.

item.title: Adobe ColdFusion Deserialization of Untrusted Data Vulnerability
item.description: Adobe ColdFusion contains a deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability that allows for code execution.

item.title: Apache Superset Insecure Default Initialization of Resource Vulnerability
item.description: Apache Superset contains an insecure default initialization of a resource vulnerability that allows an attacker to authenticate and access unauthorized resources on installations that have not altered the default configured SECRET_KEY according to installation instructions.

item.title: Apple Multiple Products Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS, iPadOS, macOS, tvOS, and watchOS contain an unspecified vulnerability that allows for code execution when processing a font file.

item.title: D-Link DSL-2750B Devices Command Injection Vulnerability
item.description: D-Link DSL-2750B devices contain a command injection vulnerability that allows remote, unauthenticated command injection via the login.cgi cli parameter.

item.title: Joomla! Improper Access Control Vulnerability
item.description: Joomla! contains an improper access control vulnerability that allows unauthorized access to webservice endpoints.

item.title: Google Chromium WebRTC Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
item.description: Google Chromium WebRTC, an open-source project providing web browsers with real-time communication, contains a heap buffer overflow vulnerability that allows a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page. This vulnerability could impact web browsers using WebRTC, including but not limited to Google Chrome.

item.title: Spreadsheet::ParseExcel Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: Spreadsheet::ParseExcel contains a remote code execution vulnerability due to passing unvalidated input from a file into a string-type “eval”. Specifically, the issue stems from the evaluation of Number format strings within the Excel parsing logic.

item.title: QNAP VioStor NVR OS Command Injection Vulnerability
item.description: QNAP VioStar NVR contains an OS command injection vulnerability that allows authenticated users to execute commands via a network.

item.title: FXC AE1021, AE1021PE OS Command Injection Vulnerability
item.description: FXC AE1021 and AE1021PE contain an OS command injection vulnerability that allows authenticated users to execute commands via a network.

item.title: Unitronics Vision PLC and HMI Insecure Default Password Vulnerability
item.description: Unitronics Vision Series PLCs and HMIs ship with an insecure default password, which if left unchanged, can allow attackers to execute remote commands.

item.title: Qlik Sense HTTP Tunneling Vulnerability
item.description: Qlik Sense contains an HTTP tunneling vulnerability that allows an attacker to escalate privileges and execute HTTP requests on the backend server hosting the software.

item.title: Qlik Sense Path Traversal Vulnerability
item.description: Qlik Sense contains a path traversal vulnerability that allows a remote, unauthenticated attacker to create an anonymous session by sending maliciously crafted HTTP requests. This anonymous session could allow the attacker to send further requests to unauthorized endpoints.

item.title: Qualcomm Multiple Chipsets Use-After-Free Vulnerability
item.description: Multiple Qualcomm chipsets contain a use-after-free vulnerability when process shell memory is freed using IOCTL munmap call and process initialization is in progress.

item.title: Qualcomm Multiple Chipsets Use-After-Free Vulnerability
item.description: Multiple Qualcomm chipsets contain a use-after-free vulnerability due to memory corruption in DSP Services during a remote call from HLOS to DSP.

item.title: Qualcomm Multiple Chipsets Use of Out-of-Range Pointer Offset Vulnerability
item.description: Multiple Qualcomm chipsets contain a use of out-of-range pointer offset vulnerability due to memory corruption in Graphics while submitting a large list of sync points in an AUX command to the IOCTL_KGSL_GPU_AUX_COMMAND.

item.title: Qualcomm Multiple Chipsets Integer Overflow Vulnerability
item.description: Multiple Qualcomm chipsets contain an integer overflow vulnerability due to memory corruption in Graphics Linux while assigning shared virtual memory region during IOCTL call.

item.title: Apple Multiple Products WebKit Out-of-Bounds Read Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS, iPadOS, macOS, and Safari WebKit contain an out-of-bounds read vulnerability that may disclose sensitive information when processing web content.

item.title: Apple Multiple Products WebKit Memory Corruption Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS, iPadOS, macOS, and Safari WebKit contain a memory corruption vulnerability that leads to code execution when processing web content.

item.title: ownCloud graphapi Information Disclosure Vulnerability
item.description: ownCloud graphapi contains an information disclosure vulnerability that can reveal sensitive data stored in phpinfo() via GetPhpInfo.php, including administrative credentials.

item.title: Google Skia Integer Overflow Vulnerability
item.description: Google Chromium Skia contains an integer overflow vulnerability that allows a remote attacker, who has compromised the renderer process, to potentially perform a sandbox escape via a malicious file. This vulnerability affects Google Chrome and ChromeOS, Android, Flutter, and possibly other products.

item.title: GNU C Library Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
item.description: GNU C Library's dynamic loader ld.so contains a buffer overflow vulnerability when processing the GLIBC_TUNABLES environment variable, allowing a local attacker to execute code with elevated privileges.

item.title: Oracle Fusion Middleware Unspecified Vulnerability
item.description: Oracle Fusion Middleware contains an unspecified vulnerability in the WLS Core Components that allows an unauthenticated attacker with network access via IIOP to compromise the WebLogic Server.

item.title: Sophos Web Appliance Command Injection Vulnerability
item.description: Sophos Web Appliance contains a command injection vulnerability in the warn-proceed handler that allows for remote code execution.

item.title: Microsoft Windows Mark of the Web (MOTW) Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows Mark of the Web (MOTW) contains a security feature bypass vulnerability resulting in a limited loss of integrity and availability of security features.

item.title: Microsoft Windows Cloud Files Mini Filter Driver Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows Cloud Files Mini Filter Driver contains a privilege escalation vulnerability that could allow an attacker to gain SYSTEM privileges.

item.title: Microsoft Windows SmartScreen Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows SmartScreen contains a security feature bypass vulnerability that could allow an attacker to bypass Windows Defender SmartScreen checks and their associated prompts.

item.title: Microsoft Windows Desktop Window Manager (DWM) Core Library Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows Desktop Window Manager (DWM) Core Library contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for privilege escalation.

item.title: Juniper Junos OS SRX Series Missing Authentication for Critical Function Vulnerability
item.description: Juniper Junos OS on SRX Series contains a missing authentication for critical function vulnerability that allows an unauthenticated, network-based attacker to cause limited impact to the file system integrity. With a specific request to webauth_operation.php that doesn't require authentication, an attacker is able to upload arbitrary files via J-Web, leading to a loss of integrity for a certain part of the file system, which may allow chaining to other vulnerabilities.

item.title: Juniper Junos OS EX Series Missing Authentication for Critical Function Vulnerability
item.description: Juniper Junos OS on EX Series contains a missing authentication for critical function vulnerability that allows an unauthenticated, network-based attacker to cause limited impact to the file system integrity. With a specific request to installAppPackage.php that doesn't require authentication, an attacker is able to upload arbitrary files via J-Web, leading to a loss of integrity for a certain part of the file system, which may allow chaining to other vulnerabilities.

item.title: Juniper Junos OS SRX Series Missing Authentication for Critical Function Vulnerability
item.description: Juniper Junos OS on SRX Series contains a missing authentication for critical function vulnerability that allows an unauthenticated, network-based attacker to cause limited impact to the file system integrity. With a specific request to user.php that doesn't require authentication, an attacker is able to upload arbitrary files via J-Web, leading to a loss of integrity for a certain part of the file system, which may allow chaining to other vulnerabilities.

item.title: Juniper Junos OS EX Series and SRX Series PHP External Variable Modification Vulnerability
item.description: Juniper Junos OS on EX Series and SRX Series contains a PHP external variable modification vulnerability that allows an unauthenticated, network-based attacker to control an important environment variable. Using a crafted request, which sets the variable PHPRC, an attacker is able to modify the PHP execution environment allowing the injection und execution of code.

item.title: Juniper Junos OS EX Series PHP External Variable Modification Vulnerability
item.description: Juniper Junos OS on EX Series contains a PHP external variable modification vulnerability that allows an unauthenticated, network-based attacker to control certain, important environment variables. Using a crafted request an attacker is able to modify certain PHP environment variables, leading to partial loss of integrity, which may allow chaining to other vulnerabilities.

item.title: SysAid Server Path Traversal Vulnerability
item.description: SysAid Server (on-premises version) contains a path traversal vulnerability that leads to code execution.

item.title: Service Location Protocol (SLP) Denial-of-Service Vulnerability
item.description: The Service Location Protocol (SLP) contains a denial-of-service (DoS) vulnerability that could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to register services and use spoofed UDP traffic to conduct a denial-of-service (DoS) attack with a significant amplification factor.

item.title: Atlassian Confluence Data Center and Server Improper Authorization Vulnerability
item.description: Atlassian Confluence Data Center and Server contain an improper authorization vulnerability that can result in significant data loss when exploited by an unauthenticated attacker. There is no impact on confidentiality since the attacker cannot exfiltrate any data.

item.title: Apache ActiveMQ Deserialization of Untrusted Data Vulnerability
item.description: Apache ActiveMQ contains a deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability that may allow a remote attacker with network access to a broker to run shell commands by manipulating serialized class types in the OpenWire protocol to cause the broker to instantiate any class on the classpath.

item.title: F5 BIG-IP Configuration Utility Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
item.description: F5 BIG-IP Configuration utility contains an authentication bypass using an alternate path or channel vulnerability due to undisclosed requests that may allow an unauthenticated attacker with network access to the BIG-IP system through the management port and/or self IP addresses to execute system commands. This vulnerability can be used in conjunction with CVE-2023-46748.

item.title: F5 BIG-IP Configuration Utility SQL Injection Vulnerability
item.description: F5 BIG-IP Configuration utility contains an SQL injection vulnerability that may allow an authenticated attacker with network access through the BIG-IP management port and/or self IP addresses to execute system commands. This vulnerability can be used in conjunction with CVE-2023-46747.

item.title: Roundcube Webmail Persistent Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Vulnerability
item.description: Roundcube Webmail contains a persistent cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability that allows a remote attacker to run malicious JavaScript code.

item.title: Cisco IOS XE Web UI Command Injection Vulnerability
item.description: Cisco IOS XE contains a command injection vulnerability in the web user interface. When chained with CVE-2023-20198, the attacker can leverage the new local user to elevate privilege to root and write the implant to the file system. Cisco identified CVE-2023-20273 as the vulnerability exploited to deploy the implant. CVE-2021-1435, previously associated with the exploitation events, is no longer believed to be related to this activity.

item.title: Citrix NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
item.description: Citrix NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway contain a buffer overflow vulnerability that allows for sensitive information disclosure when configured as a Gateway (VPN virtual server, ICA Proxy, CVPN, RDP Proxy) or AAA virtual server.

item.title: Cisco IOS XE Web UI Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Cisco IOS XE Web UI contains a privilege escalation vulnerability in the web user interface that could allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to create an account with privilege level 15 access. The attacker can then use that account to gain control of the affected device.

item.title: HTTP/2 Rapid Reset Attack Vulnerability
item.description: HTTP/2 contains a rapid reset vulnerability that allows for a distributed denial-of-service attack (DDoS).

item.title: Microsoft WordPad Information Disclosure Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft WordPad contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for information disclosure.

item.title: Microsoft Skype for Business Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Skype for Business contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for privilege escalation.

item.title: Cisco IOS and IOS XE Group Encrypted Transport VPN Out-of-Bounds Write Vulnerability
item.description: Cisco IOS and IOS XE contain an out-of-bounds write vulnerability in the Group Encrypted Transport VPN (GET VPN) feature that could allow an authenticated, remote attacker who has administrative control of either a group member or a key server to execute malicious code or cause a device to crash.

item.title: Adobe Acrobat and Reader Use-After-Free Vulnerability
item.description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader contains a use-after-free vulnerability that allows for code execution in the context of the current user.

item.title: Apple iOS and iPadOS Kernel Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS and iPadOS contain an unspecified vulnerability that allows for local privilege escalation.

item.title: Progress WS_FTP Server Deserialization of Untrusted Data Vulnerability
item.description: Progress WS_FTP Server contains a deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability in the Ad Hoc Transfer module that allows an authenticated attacker to execute remote commands on the underlying operating system.

item.title: Atlassian Confluence Data Center and Server Broken Access Control Vulnerability
item.description: Atlassian Confluence Data Center and Server contains a broken access control vulnerability that allows an attacker to create unauthorized Confluence administrator accounts and access Confluence.

item.title: Microsoft Windows CNG Key Isolation Service Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows Cryptographic Next Generation (CNG) Key Isolation Service contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows an attacker to gain specific limited SYSTEM privileges.

item.title: JetBrains TeamCity Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
item.description: JetBrains TeamCity contains an authentication bypass vulnerability that allows for remote code execution on TeamCity Server.

item.title: Arm Mali GPU Kernel Driver Use-After-Free Vulnerability
item.description: Arm Mali GPU Kernel Driver contains a use-after-free vulnerability that allows a local, non-privileged user to make improper GPU memory processing operations to gain access to already freed memory.

item.title: Google Chromium libvpx Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
item.description: Google Chromium libvpx contains a heap buffer overflow vulnerability in vp8 encoding that allows a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page. This vulnerability could impact web browsers using libvpx, including but not limited to Google Chrome.

item.title: Red Hat JBoss RichFaces Framework Expression Language Injection Vulnerability
item.description: Red Hat JBoss RichFaces Framework contains an expression language injection vulnerability via the UserResource resource. A remote, unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute malicious code using a chain of Java serialized objects via org.ajax4jsf.resource.UserResource$UriData.

item.title: Apple Multiple Products WebKit Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS, iPadOS, macOS, and Safari WebKit contain an unspecified vulnerability that can allow an attacker to execute code when processing web content.

item.title: Apple Multiple Products Kernel Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS, iPadOS, macOS, and watchOS contain an unspecified vulnerability that allows for local privilege escalation.

item.title: Apple Multiple Products Improper Certificate Validation Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS, iPadOS, macOS, and watchOS contain an improper certificate validation vulnerability that can allow a malicious app to bypass signature validation.

item.title: Trend Micro Apex One and Worry-Free Business Security Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: Trend Micro Apex One and Worry-Free Business Security contain an unspecified vulnerability in the third-party anti-virus uninstaller that could allow an attacker to manipulate the module to conduct remote code execution. An attacker must first obtain administrative console access on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
item.category: Apex One and Worry-Free Business Security

item.title: MinIO Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability
item.description: MinIO contains a security feature bypass vulnerability that allows an attacker to use crafted requests to bypass metadata bucket name checking and put an object into any bucket while processing `PostPolicyBucket` to conduct privilege escalation. To carry out this attack, the attacker requires credentials with `arn:aws:s3:::*` permission, as well as enabled Console API access.

item.title: Laravel Ignition File Upload Vulnerability
item.description: Laravel Ignition contains a file upload vulnerability that allows unauthenticated remote attackers to execute malicious code due to insecure usage of file_get_contents() and file_put_contents().

item.title: Zyxel EMG2926 Routers Command Injection Vulnerability
item.description: Zyxel EMG2926 routers contain a command injection vulnerability located in the diagnostic tools, specifically the nslookup function. A malicious user may exploit numerous vectors to execute malicious commands on the router, such as the ping_ip parameter to the expert/maintenance/diagnostic/nslookup URI.

item.title: Realtek SDK Improper Input Validation Vulnerability
item.description: Realtek SDK contains an improper input validation vulnerability in the miniigd SOAP service that allows remote attackers to execute malicious code via a crafted NewInternalClient request.

item.title: Samsung Mobile Devices Use-After-Free Vulnerability
item.description: Samsung devices with selected Exynos chipsets contain a use-after-free vulnerability that allows malicious memory write and code execution.

item.title: Adobe Acrobat and Reader Out-of-Bounds Write Vulnerability
item.description: Adobe Acrobat and Reader contains an out-of-bounds write vulnerability that allows for code execution.

item.title: Google Chromium WebP Heap-Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
item.description: Google Chromium WebP contains a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability that allows a remote attacker to perform an out-of-bounds memory write via a crafted HTML page. This vulnerability can affect applications that use the WebP Codec.

item.title: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance and Firepower Threat Defense Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
item.description: Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance and Firepower Threat Defense contain an unauthorized access vulnerability that could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to conduct a brute force attack in an attempt to identify valid username and password combinations or establish a clientless SSL VPN session with an unauthorized user.
item.category: Adaptive Security Appliance and Firepower Threat Defense

item.title: Android Framework Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Android Framework contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for privilege escalation.

item.title: Microsoft Streaming Service Proxy Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Streaming Service Proxy contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for privilege escalation.

item.title: Microsoft Word Information Disclosure Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Word contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for information disclosure.

item.title: Apple iOS, iPadOS, and watchOS Wallet Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS, iPadOS, and watchOS contain an unspecified vulnerability due to a validation issue affecting Wallet in which a maliciously crafted attachment may result in code execution. This vulnerability was chained with CVE-2023-41064.

item.title: Apple iOS, iPadOS, and macOS ImageIO Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS, iPadOS, and macOS contain a buffer overflow vulnerability in ImageIO when processing a maliciously crafted image, which may lead to code execution. This vulnerability was chained with CVE-2023-41061.

item.title: Apache RocketMQ Command Execution Vulnerability
item.description: Several components of Apache RocketMQ, including NameServer, Broker, and Controller, are exposed to the extranet and lack permission verification. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability by using the update configuration function to execute commands as the system users that RocketMQ is running as or achieve the same effect by forging the RocketMQ protocol content.

item.title: Ignite Realtime Openfire Path Traversal Vulnerability
item.description: Ignite Realtime Openfire contains a path traversal vulnerability that allows an unauthenticated attacker to access restricted pages in the Openfire Admin Console reserved for administrative users.

item.title: RARLAB WinRAR Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: RARLAB WinRAR contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows an attacker to execute code when a user attempts to view a benign file within a ZIP archive.

item.title: Veeam Backup & Replication Cloud Connect Missing Authentication for Critical Function Vulnerability
item.description: Veeam Backup & Replication Cloud Connect component contains a missing authentication for critical function vulnerability that allows an unauthenticated user operating within the backup infrastructure network perimeter to obtain encrypted credentials stored in the configuration database. This may lead to an attacker gaining access to the backup infrastructure hosts.

item.title: Ivanti Sentry Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
item.description: Ivanti Sentry, formerly known as MobileIron Sentry, contains an authentication bypass vulnerability that may allow an attacker to bypass authentication controls on the administrative interface due to an insufficiently restrictive Apache HTTPD configuration.

item.title: Adobe ColdFusion Deserialization of Untrusted Data Vulnerability
item.description: Adobe ColdFusion contains a deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability that could result in code execution in the context of the current user.

item.title: Citrix Content Collaboration ShareFile Improper Access Control Vulnerability
item.description: Citrix Content Collaboration contains an improper access control vulnerability that could allow an unauthenticated attacker to remotely compromise customer-managed ShareFile storage zones controllers.

item.title: Microsoft .NET Core and Visual Studio Denial-of-Service Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft .NET Core and Visual Studio contain an unspecified vulnerability that allows for denial-of-service (DoS).

item.title: Zyxel P660HN-T1A Routers Command Injection Vulnerability
item.description: Zyxel P660HN-T1A routers contain a command injection vulnerability in the Remote System Log forwarding function, which is accessible by an unauthenticated user and exploited via the remote_host parameter of the ViewLog.asp page.

item.title: Ivanti Endpoint Manager Mobile (EPMM) Path Traversal Vulnerability
item.description: Ivanti Endpoint Manager Mobile (EPMM) contains a path traversal vulnerability that enables an authenticated administrator to perform malicious file writes to the EPMM server. This vulnerability can be used in conjunction with CVE-2023-35078 to bypass authentication and ACLs restrictions (if applicable).

item.title: Zimbra Collaboration (ZCS) Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Vulnerability
item.description: Zimbra Collaboration Suite (ZCS) contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability impacting the confidentiality and integrity of data.

item.title: Apple Multiple Products Kernel Unspecified Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS, iPadOS, macOS, tvOS, and watchOS contain an unspecified vulnerability allowing an app to modify a sensitive kernel state.

item.title: Ivanti Endpoint Manager Mobile Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
item.description: Ivanti Endpoint Manager Mobile (EPMM, previously branded MobileIron Core) contains an authentication bypass vulnerability that allows unauthenticated access to specific API paths. An attacker with access to these API paths can access personally identifiable information (PII) such as names, phone numbers, and other mobile device details for users on a vulnerable system. An attacker can also make other configuration changes including installing software and modifying security profiles on registered devices.

item.title: Adobe ColdFusion Improper Access Control Vulnerability
item.description: Adobe ColdFusion contains an improper access control vulnerability that allows for a security feature bypass.

item.title: Adobe ColdFusion Improper Access Control Vulnerability
item.description: Adobe ColdFusion contains an improper access control vulnerability that allows for a security feature bypass.

item.title: Citrix NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway Code Injection Vulnerability
item.description: Citrix NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway contains a code injection vulnerability that allows for unauthenticated remote code execution.

item.title: Microsoft Windows Search Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows Search contains an unspecified vulnerability that could allow an attacker to evade Mark of the Web (MOTW) defenses via a specially crafted malicious file, leading to remote code execution.

item.title: Apple Multiple Products WebKit Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS, iPadOS, macOS, and Safari WebKit contain an unspecified vulnerability that can allow an attacker to execute code when processing web content.

item.title: SolarView Compact Command Injection Vulnerability
item.description: SolarView Compact contains a command injection vulnerability due to improper validation of input values on the send test mail console of the product's web server.

item.title: Netwrix Auditor Insecure Object Deserialization Vulnerability
item.description: Netwrix Auditor User Activity Video Recording component contains an insecure objection deserialization vulnerability that allows an unauthenticated, remote attacker to execute code as the NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM user. Successful exploitation requires that the attacker is able to reach port 9004/TCP, which is commonly blocked by standard enterprise firewalling.

item.title: Microsoft Windows Error Reporting Service Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows Error Reporting Service contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for privilege escalation.

item.title: Microsoft Outlook Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Outlook contains a security feature bypass vulnerability that allows an attacker to bypass the Microsoft Outlook Security Notice prompt.

item.title: Microsoft Windows Defender SmartScreen Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows Defender SmartScreen contains a security feature bypass vulnerability that allows an attacker to bypass the Open File - Security Warning prompt.

item.title: Microsoft Windows MSHTML Platform Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows MSHTML Platform contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for privilege escalation.

item.title: Arm Mali GPU Kernel Driver Use-After-Free Vulnerability
item.description: Arm Mali GPU Kernel Driver contains a use-after-free vulnerability that may allow a non-privileged user to gain root privilege and/or disclose information.

item.title: Samsung Mobile Devices Improper Boundary Check Vulnerability
item.description: Samsung mobile devices contain an improper boundary check vulnerability within DSP driver that allows for out-of-bounds memory access.

item.title: Samsung Mobile Devices Unspecified Vulnerability
item.description: Samsung mobile devices contain an unspecified vulnerability within DSP driver that allows attackers to load ELF libraries inside DSP.

item.title: Samsung Mobile Devices Race Condition Vulnerability
item.description: Samsung mobile devices contain a race condition vulnerability within the MFC charger driver that leads to a use-after-free allowing for a write given a radio privilege is compromised.

item.title: Samsung Mobile Devices Race Condition Vulnerability
item.description: Samsung mobile devices contain a race condition vulnerability within the MFC charger driver that leads to a use-after-free allowing for a write given a radio privilege is compromised.

item.title: Samsung Mobile Devices Improper Input Validation Vulnerability
item.description: Samsung mobile devices contain an improper input validation vulnerability within the modem interface driver that results in a format string bug leading to kernel panic.

item.title: Samsung Mobile Devices Out-of-Bounds Read Vulnerability
item.description: Samsung mobile devices contain an out-of-bounds read vulnerability within the modem interface driver due to a lack of boundary checking of a buffer in set_skb_priv(), leading to remote code execution by dereference of an invalid function pointer.

item.title: D-Link DWL-2600AP Access Point Command Injection Vulnerability
item.description: D-Link DWL-2600AP access point contains an authenticated command injection vulnerability via the Save Configuration functionality in the Web interface, using shell metacharacters in the admin.cgi?action=config_save configBackup or downloadServerip parameter.

item.title: D-Link DIR-859 Router Command Execution Vulnerability
item.description: D-Link DIR-859 router contains a command execution vulnerability in the UPnP endpoint URL, /gena.cgi. Exploitation allows an unauthenticated remote attacker to execute system commands as root by sending a specially crafted HTTP SUBSCRIBE request to the UPnP service when connecting to the local network.

item.title: Zyxel Multiple NAS Devices Command Injection Vulnerability
item.description: Multiple Zyxel network-attached storage (NAS) devices contain a pre-authentication command injection vulnerability that could allow an unauthenticated attacker to execute commands remotely via a crafted HTTP request.

item.title: VMware Tools Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
item.description: VMware Tools contains an authentication bypass vulnerability in the vgauth module. A fully compromised ESXi host can force VMware Tools to fail to authenticate host-to-guest operations, impacting the confidentiality and integrity of the guest virtual machine. An attacker must have root access over ESXi to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: Apple Multiple Products WebKit Type Confusion Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS, iPadOS, macOS, and Safari WebKit contain a type confusion vulnerability that leads to code execution when processing maliciously crafted web content.

item.title: Apple Multiple Products WebKit Memory Corruption Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS, iPadOS, macOS, and Safari WebKit contain a memory corruption vulnerability that leads to code execution when processing web content.

item.title: Apple Multiple Products Integer Overflow Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS. iPadOS, macOS, and watchOS contain an integer overflow vulnerability that could allow an application to execute code with kernel privileges.

item.title: Microsoft Win32k Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Win32k contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for privilege escalation.

item.title: Mozilla Firefox, Firefox ESR, and Thunderbird Use-After-Free Vulnerability
item.description: Mozilla Firefox, Firefox ESR, and Thunderbird contain a use-after-free vulnerability in SVG Animation, targeting Firefox and Tor browser users on Windows.

item.title: Roundcube Webmail SQL Injection Vulnerability
item.description: Roundcube Webmail is vulnerable to SQL injection via search or search_params.

item.title: Roundcube Webmail Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: Roundcube Webmail contains an remote code execution vulnerability that allows attackers to execute code via shell metacharacters in a configuration setting for im_convert_path or im_identify_path.

item.title: Roundcube Webmail Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Vulnerability
item.description: Roundcube Webmail contains a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability that allows an attacker to send a plain text e-mail message with Javascript in a link reference element that is mishandled by linkref_addinindex in rcube_string_replacer.php.

item.title: Vmware Aria Operations for Networks Command Injection Vulnerability
item.description: VMware Aria Operations for Networks (formerly vRealize Network Insight) contains a command injection vulnerability that allows a malicious actor with network access to perform an attack resulting in remote code execution.

item.title: Fortinet FortiOS and FortiProxy SSL-VPN Heap-Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
item.description: Fortinet FortiOS and FortiProxy SSL-VPN contain a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability which can allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to execute code or commands via specifically crafted requests.

item.title: Google Chromium V8 Type Confusion Vulnerability
item.description: Google Chromium V8 Engine contains a type confusion vulnerability that allows a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page. This vulnerability could affect multiple web browsers that utilize Chromium, including, but not limited to, Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, and Opera.

item.title: Zyxel Multiple Firewalls Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
item.description: Zyxel ATP, USG FLEX, USG FLEX 50(W), USG20(W)-VPN, VPN, and ZyWALL/USG firewalls contain a buffer overflow vulnerability in the ID processing function that could allow an unauthenticated attacker to cause denial-of-service (DoS) conditions and remote code execution on an affected device.

item.title: Zyxel Multiple Firewalls Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
item.description: Zyxel ATP, USG FLEX, USG FLEX 50(W), USG20(W)-VPN, VPN, and ZyWALL/USG firewalls contain a buffer overflow vulnerability in the notification function that could allow an unauthenticated attacker to cause denial-of-service (DoS) conditions and remote code execution on an affected device.

item.title: Progress MOVEit Transfer SQL Injection Vulnerability
item.description: Progress MOVEit Transfer contains a SQL injection vulnerability that could allow an unauthenticated attacker to gain unauthorized access to MOVEit Transfer's database. Depending on the database engine being used (MySQL, Microsoft SQL Server, or Azure SQL), an attacker may be able to infer information about the structure and contents of the database in addition to executing SQL statements that alter or delete database elements.

item.title: Zyxel Multiple Firewalls OS Command Injection Vulnerability
item.description: Zyxel ATP, USG FLEX, VPN, and ZyWALL/USG firewalls allow for improper error message handling which could allow an unauthenticated attacker to execute OS commands remotely by sending crafted packets to an affected device.

item.title: Barracuda Networks ESG Appliance Improper Input Validation Vulnerability
item.description: Barracuda Email Security Gateway (ESG) appliance contains an improper input validation vulnerability of a user-supplied .tar file, leading to remote command injection.

item.title: Apple Multiple Products WebKit Use-After-Free Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS, iPadOS, macOS, tvOS, watchOS, and Safari WebKit contain a use-after-free vulnerability that leads to code execution.

item.title: Apple Multiple Products WebKit Out-of-Bounds Read Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS, iPadOS, macOS, tvOS, watchOS, and Safari WebKit contain an out-of-bounds read vulnerability that may disclose sensitive information.

item.title: Apple Multiple Products WebKit Sandbox Escape Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS, iPadOS, macOS, tvOS, watchOS, and Safari WebKit contain an unspecified vulnerability that can allow a remote attacker to break out of the Web Content sandbox.

item.title: Samsung Mobile Devices Insertion of Sensitive Information Into Log File Vulnerability
item.description: Samsung mobile devices running Android 11, 12, and 13 contain an insertion of sensitive information into log file vulnerability that allows a privileged, local attacker to conduct an address space layout randomization (ASLR) bypass.

item.title: Cisco IOS, IOS XR, and IOS XE IKEv1 Information Disclosure Vulnerability
item.description: Cisco IOS, IOS XR, and IOS XE contain insufficient condition checks in the part of the code that handles Internet Key Exchange version 1 (IKEv1) security negotiation requests. contains an information disclosure vulnerability in the Internet Key Exchange version 1 (IKEv1) that could allow an attacker to retrieve memory contents. Successful exploitation could allow the attacker to retrieve memory contents, which can lead to information disclosure.
item.category: IOS, IOS XR, and IOS XE

item.title: Cisco IOS Denial-of-Service Vulnerability
item.description: Cisco IOS contains an unspecified vulnerability that may block further telnet, reverse telnet, Remote Shell (RSH), Secure Shell (SSH), and in some cases, Hypertext Transport Protocol (HTTP) access to the Cisco device.

item.title: Apache Tomcat Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: Apache Tomcat contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for remote code execution if JmxRemoteLifecycleListener is used and an attacker can reach Java Management Extension (JMX) ports. This CVE exists because this listener wasn't updated for consistency with the Oracle patched issues for CVE-2016-3427 which affected credential types.

item.title: Oracle Java SE and JRockit Unspecified Vulnerability
item.description: Oracle Java SE and JRockit contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via vectors related to Java Management Extensions (JMX). This vulnerability can be exploited through sandboxed Java Web Start applications and sandboxed Java applets. It can also be exploited by supplying data to APIs in the specified component without using sandboxed Java Web Start applications or sandboxed Java applets, such as through a web service.

item.title: Jenkins User Interface (UI) Information Disclosure Vulnerability
item.description: Jenkins User Interface (UI) contains an information disclosure vulnerability that allows users to see the names of jobs and builds otherwise inaccessible to them on the "Fingerprints" pages.

item.title: Linux Kernel Improper Input Validation Vulnerability
item.description: Linux Kernel contains an improper input validation vulnerability in the Reliable Datagram Sockets (RDS) protocol implementation that allows local users to gain privileges via crafted use of the sendmsg and recvmsg system calls.

item.title: Linux Kernel Race Condition Vulnerability
item.description: Linux Kernel contains a race condition vulnerability within the n_tty_write function that allows local users to cause a denial-of-service (DoS) or gain privileges via read and write operations with long strings.

item.title: Red Hat Polkit Incorrect Authorization Vulnerability
item.description: Red Hat Polkit contains an incorrect authorization vulnerability through the bypassing of credential checks for D-Bus requests, allowing for privilege escalation.

item.title: Multiple Ruckus Wireless Products CSRF and RCE Vulnerability
item.description: Ruckus Wireless Access Point (AP) software contains an unspecified vulnerability in the web services component. If the web services component is enabled on the AP, an attacker can perform cross-site request forgery (CSRF) or remote code execution (RCE). This vulnerability impacts Ruckus ZoneDirector, SmartZone, and Solo APs.

item.title: Microsoft Win32K Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Win32k contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for privilege escalation up to SYSTEM privileges.

item.title: Oracle WebLogic Server Unspecified Vulnerability
item.description: Oracle WebLogic Server contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows an unauthenticated attacker with network access via T3, IIOP, to compromise Oracle WebLogic Server.

item.title: Apache Log4j2 Deserialization of Untrusted Data Vulnerability
item.description: Apache Log4j2 contains a deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability due to the incomplete fix of CVE-2021-44228, where the Thread Context Lookup Pattern is vulnerable to remote code execution in certain non-default configurations.

item.title: TP-Link Archer AX-21 Command Injection Vulnerability
item.description: TP-Link Archer AX-21 contains a command injection vulnerability that allows for remote code execution.

item.title: Google Chrome Skia Integer Overflow Vulnerability
item.description: Google Chromium Skia contains an integer overflow vulnerability that allows a remote attacker, who has compromised the renderer process, to potentially perform a sandbox escape via a crafted HTML page. This vulnerability affects Google Chrome and ChromeOS, Android, Flutter, and possibly other products.

item.title: PaperCut MF/NG Improper Access Control Vulnerability
item.description: PaperCut MF/NG contains an improper access control vulnerability within the SetupCompleted class that allows authentication bypass and code execution in the context of system.

item.title: MinIO Information Disclosure Vulnerability
item.description: MinIO contains a vulnerability in a cluster deployment where MinIO returns all environment variables, which allows for information disclosure.

item.title: Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software SNMP Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: The Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP) subsystem of Cisco IOS and IOS XE contains a vulnerability that could allow an authenticated, remote attacker to remotely execute code on an affected system or cause an affected system to reload.

item.title: Google Chromium V8 Type Confusion Vulnerability
item.description: Google Chromium V8 Engine contains a type confusion vulnerability that allows a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page. This vulnerability could affect multiple web browsers that utilize Chromium, including, but not limited to, Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, and Opera.

item.title: Apple macOS Use-After-Free Vulnerability
item.description: Apple macOS contains a use-after-free vulnerability that could allow for privilege escalation.

item.title: Novi Survey Insecure Deserialization Vulnerability
item.description: Novi Survey contains an insecure deserialization vulnerability that allows remote attackers to execute code on the server in the context of the service account.

item.title: Android Framework Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Android Framework contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for privilege escalation after updating an app to a higher Target SDK with no additional execution privileges needed.

item.title: Microsoft Windows Common Log File System (CLFS) Driver Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows Common Log File System (CLFS) driver contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for privilege escalation.

item.title: Apple iOS, iPadOS, and macOS IOSurfaceAccelerator Out-of-Bounds Write Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS, iPadOS, and macOS IOSurfaceAccelerator contain an out-of-bounds write vulnerability that allows an app to execute code with kernel privileges.

item.title: Apple Multiple Products WebKit Use-After-Free Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS, iPadOS, macOS, and Safari WebKit contain a use-after-free vulnerability that leads to code execution when processing maliciously crafted web content.

item.title: Arm Mali GPU Kernel Driver Information Disclosure Vulnerability
item.description: Arm Mali GPU Kernel Driver contains an information disclosure vulnerability that allows a non-privileged user to make valid GPU processing operations that expose sensitive kernel metadata.

item.title: Microsoft Windows Certificate Dialog Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows Certificate Dialog contains a privilege escalation vulnerability, allowing attackers to run processes in an elevated context.

item.title: Veritas Backup Exec Agent Command Execution Vulnerability
item.description: Veritas Backup Exec (BE) Agent contains a command execution vulnerability that could allow an attacker to use a data management protocol command to execute a command on the BE Agent machine.

item.title: Veritas Backup Exec Agent Improper Authentication Vulnerability
item.description: Veritas Backup Exec (BE) Agent contains an improper authentication vulnerability that could allow an attacker unauthorized access to the BE Agent via SHA authentication scheme.

item.title: Veritas Backup Exec Agent File Access Vulnerability
item.description: Veritas Backup Exec (BE) Agent contains a file access vulnerability that could allow an attacker to specially craft input parameters on a data management protocol command to access files on the BE Agent machine.

item.title: Zimbra Collaboration (ZCS) Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Vulnerability
item.description: Zimbra Collaboration Suite (ZCS) contains a cross-site scripting vulnerability by allowing an endpoint URL to accept parameters without sanitizing.

item.title: Arm Mali GPU Kernel Driver Unspecified Vulnerability
item.description: Arm Mali GPU Kernel Driver contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows a non-privileged user to achieve write access to read-only memory pages.

item.title: Google Chromium Network Service Use-After-Free Vulnerability
item.description: Google Chromium Network Service contains a use-after-free vulnerability that allows a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page. This vulnerability could affect multiple web browsers that utilize Chromium, including, but not limited to, Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, and Opera.

item.title: Linux Kernel Use-After-Free Vulnerability
item.description: Linux kernel contains a use-after-free vulnerability that allows for privilege escalation to gain ring0 access from the system user.

item.title: Arm Mali GPU Kernel Driver Use-After-Free Vulnerability
item.description: Arm Mali GPU Kernel Driver contains a use-after-free vulnerability that may allow a non-privileged user to gain root privilege and/or disclose information.

item.title: Apple iOS, iPadOS, and macOS Out-of-Bounds Write Vulnerability
item.description: Apple GPU drivers, included in iOS, iPadOS, and macOS, contain an out-of-bounds write vulnerability that may allow a malicious application to execute code with kernel privileges.

item.title: Fortra Cobalt Strike Teamserver Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Vulnerability
item.description: Fortra Cobalt Strike contains a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Teamserver that would allow an attacker to set a malformed username in the Beacon configuration, allowing them to execute code remotely.

item.title: Fortra Cobalt Strike User Interface Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: Fortra Cobalt Strike User Interface contains an unspecified vulnerability rooted in Java Swing that may allow remote code execution.

item.title: Samba Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: Samba contains a remote code execution vulnerability, allowing a malicious client to upload a shared library to a writable share and then cause the server to load and execute it.

item.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Internet Explorer contains a memory corruption vulnerability that allows remote attackers to execute code or cause a denial of service via a crafted website.

item.title: Adobe ColdFusion Deserialization of Untrusted Data Vulnerability
item.description: Adobe ColdFusion contains a deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability that allows for remote code execution.

item.title: Fortinet FortiOS Path Traversal Vulnerability
item.description: Fortinet FortiOS contains a path traversal vulnerability that may allow a local privileged attacker to read and write files via crafted CLI commands.

item.title: Microsoft Windows SmartScreen Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows SmartScreen contains a security feature bypass vulnerability that could allow an attacker to evade Mark of the Web (MOTW) defenses via a specially crafted malicious file.

item.title: Microsoft Office Outlook Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Office Outlook contains a privilege escalation vulnerability that allows for a NTLM Relay attack against another service to authenticate as the user.

item.title: Plex Media Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: Plex Media Server contains a remote code execution vulnerability that allows an attacker with access to the server administrator's Plex account to upload a malicious file via the Camera Upload feature and have the media server execute it.

item.title: XStream Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: XStream contains a remote code execution vulnerability that allows an attacker to manipulate the processed input stream and replace or inject objects that result in the execution of a local command on the server. This vulnerability can affect multiple products, including but not limited to VMware Cloud Foundation.

item.title: Teclib GLPI Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: Teclib GLPI contains a remote code execution vulnerability in the third-party library, htmlawed.

item.title: Apache Spark Command Injection Vulnerability
item.description: Apache Spark contains a command injection vulnerability via Spark User Interface (UI) when Access Control Lists (ACLs) are enabled.

item.title: Zoho ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus contains an unspecified vulnerability allowing for remote code execution when performing a password change or reset.

item.title: ZK Framework AuUploader Unspecified Vulnerability
item.description: ZK Framework AuUploader servlets contain an unspecified vulnerability that could allow an attacker to retrieve the content of a file located in the web context. The ZK Framework is an open-source Java framework. This vulnerability can impact multiple products, including but not limited to ConnectWise R1Soft Server Backup Manager.

item.title: Mitel MiVoice Connect Command Injection Vulnerability
item.description: The Mitel Edge Gateway component of MiVoice Connect allows an authenticated attacker with internal network access to execute commands within the context of the system.

item.title: Mitel MiVoice Connect Code Injection Vulnerability
item.description: The Director component in Mitel MiVoice Connect allows an authenticated attacker with internal network access to execute code within the context of the application.

item.title: IBM Aspera Faspex Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: IBM Aspera Faspex could allow a remote attacker to execute code on the system, caused by a YAML deserialization flaw.

item.title: Cacti Command Injection Vulnerability
item.description: Cacti contains a command injection vulnerability that allows an unauthenticated user to execute code.

item.title: Microsoft Windows Graphic Component Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows Graphic Component contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for privilege escalation.

item.title: Apple Multiple Products WebKit Type Confusion Vulnerability
item.description: WebKit in Apple iOS, MacOS, Safari and iPadOS contains a type confusion vulnerability that may lead to code execution.

item.title: Microsoft Windows Common Log File System (CLFS) Driver Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows Common Log File System (CLFS) driver contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for privilege escalation.

item.title: Microsoft Office Publisher Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Office Publisher contains a security feature bypass vulnerability that allows for a local, authenticated attack on a targeted system.

item.title: Fortra GoAnywhere MFT Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: Fortra (formerly, HelpSystems) GoAnywhere MFT contains a pre-authentication remote code execution vulnerability in the License Response Servlet due to deserializing an attacker-controlled object.

item.title: TerraMaster OS Remote Command Execution Vulnerability
item.description: TerraMaster OS contains a remote command execution vulnerability that allows an unauthenticated user to execute commands on the target endpoint.

item.title: Intel Ethernet Diagnostics Driver for Windows Denial-of-Service Vulnerability
item.description: Intel ethernet diagnostics driver for Windows IQVW32.sys and IQVW64.sys contain an unspecified vulnerability that allows for a denial-of-service (DoS).

item.title: Multiple SugarCRM Products Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: Multiple SugarCRM products contain a remote code execution vulnerability in the EmailTemplates. Using a specially crafted request, custom PHP code can be injected through the EmailTemplates.

item.title: Oracle E-Business Suite Unspecified Vulnerability
item.description: Oracle E-Business Suite contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows an unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Web Applications Desktop Integrator.

item.title: Telerik UI for ASP.NET AJAX Insecure Direct Object Reference Vulnerability
item.description: Telerik UI for ASP.NET AJAX contains an insecure direct object reference vulnerability in RadAsyncUpload that can result in file uploads in a limited location and/or remote code execution.

item.title: Zoho ManageEngine Multiple Products Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: Multiple Zoho ManageEngine products contain an unauthenticated remote code execution vulnerability due to the usage of an outdated third-party dependency, Apache Santuario.

item.title: CWP Control Web Panel OS Command Injection Vulnerability
item.description: CWP Control Web Panel (formerly CentOS Web Panel) contains an OS command injection vulnerability that allows remote attackers to execute commands via shell metacharacters in the login parameter.

item.title: Microsoft Windows Advanced Local Procedure Call (ALPC) Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows Advanced Local Procedure Call (ALPC) contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for privilege escalation.

item.title: Microsoft Exchange Server Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Exchange Server contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for privilege escalation. This vulnerability is chainable with CVE-2022-41082, which allows for remote code execution.

item.title: TIBCO JasperReports Library Directory Traversal Vulnerability
item.description: TIBCO JasperReports Library contains a directory-traversal vulnerability that may allow web server users to access contents of the host system.

item.title: TIBCO JasperReports Server Information Disclosure Vulnerability
item.description: TIBCO JasperReports Server contain a vulnerability which may allow any authenticated user read-only access to the contents of the web application, including key configuration files.

item.title: Apple iOS Type Confusion Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS contains a type confusion vulnerability when processing maliciously crafted web content leading to code execution.

item.title: Veeam Backup & Replication Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: The Veeam Distribution Service in the Backup & Replication application allows unauthenticated users to access internal API functions. A remote attacker can send input to the internal API which may lead to uploading and executing of malicious code.

item.title: Veeam Backup & Replication Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: The Veeam Distribution Service in the Backup & Replication application allows unauthenticated users to access internal API functions. A remote attacker can send input to the internal API which may lead to uploading and executing of malicious code.

item.title: Citrix Application Delivery Controller (ADC) and Gateway Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
item.description: Citrix Application Delivery Controller (ADC) and Gateway, when configured with SAML SP or IdP configuration, contain an authentication bypass vulnerability that allows an attacker to execute code as administrator.

item.title: Microsoft Defender SmartScreen Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Defender SmartScreen contains a security feature bypass vulnerability that could allow an attacker to evade Mark of the Web (MOTW) defenses via a specially crafted malicious file.

item.title: Fortinet FortiOS Heap-Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
item.description: Multiple versions of Fortinet FortiOS SSL-VPN contain a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability which can allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to execute arbitrary code or commands via specifically crafted requests.

item.title: Google Chromium V8 Type Confusion Vulnerability
item.description: Google Chromium V8 Engine contains a type confusion vulnerability that allows a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page. This vulnerability could affect multiple web browsers that utilize Chromium, including, but not limited to, Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, and Opera.

item.title: Google Chromium GPU Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
item.description: Google Chromium GPU contains a heap buffer overflow vulnerability that allows a remote attacker, who has compromised the renderer process, to potentially perform a sandbox escape via a crafted HTML page. This vulnerability could affect multiple web browsers that utilize Chromium, including, but not limited to, Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, and Opera.

item.title: Oracle Fusion Middleware Unspecified Vulnerability
item.description: Oracle Fusion Middleware Access Manager allows an unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to takeover the Access Manager product.

item.title: Microsoft Windows Mark of the Web (MOTW) Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows Mark of the Web (MOTW) contains a security feature bypass vulnerability resulting in a limited loss of integrity and availability of security features.

item.title: Samsung Mobile Devices Memory Corruption Vulnerability
item.description: Samsung mobile devices using Mali GPU contain an incorrect implementation handling file descriptor in dpu driver. This incorrect implementation results in memory corruption, leading to kernel panic. This vulnerability was chained with CVE-2021-25337 and CVE-2021-25369.

item.title: Samsung Mobile Devices Improper Access Control Vulnerability
item.description: Samsung mobile devices using Mali GPU contains an improper access control vulnerability in sec_log file. Exploitation of the vulnerability exposes sensitive kernel information to the userspace. This vulnerability was chained with CVE-2021-25337 and CVE-2021-25370.

item.title: Samsung Mobile Devices Improper Access Control Vulnerability
item.description: Samsung mobile devices contain an improper access control vulnerability in clipboard service which allows untrusted applications to read or write arbitrary files. This vulnerability was chained with CVE-2021-25369 and CVE-2021-25370.

item.title: Microsoft Windows Scripting Languages Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows contains an unspecified vulnerability in the JScript9 scripting language which allows for remote code execution.

item.title: Microsoft Windows CNG Key Isolation Service Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows Cryptographic Next Generation (CNG) Key Isolation Service contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows an attacker to gain SYSTEM-level privileges.

item.title: Microsoft Windows Print Spooler Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows Print Spooler contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows an attacker to gain SYSTEM-level privileges.

item.title: Microsoft Windows Mark of the Web (MOTW) Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows Mark of the Web (MOTW) contains a security feature bypass vulnerability resulting in a limited loss of integrity and availability of security features.

item.title: Google Chromium V8 Type Confusion Vulnerability
item.description: Google Chromium V8 Engine contains a type confusion vulnerability that allows a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page. This vulnerability could affect multiple web browsers that utilize Chromium, including, but not limited to, Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, and Opera.

item.title: Apple iOS and iPadOS Out-of-Bounds Write Vulnerability
item.description: Apple iOS and iPadOS kernel contain an out-of-bounds write vulnerability which can allow an application to perform code execution with kernel privileges.

item.title: GIGABYTE Multiple Products Unspecified Vulnerability
item.description: The GDrv low-level driver in GIGABYTE App Center, AORUS Graphics Engine, XTREME Gaming Engine, and OC GURU II exposes ring0 memcpy-like functionality that could allow a local attacker to take complete control of the affected system.

item.title: GIGABYTE Multiple Products Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: The GPCIDrv and GDrv low-level drivers in GIGABYTE App Center, AORUS Graphics Engine, XTREME Gaming Engine, and OC GURU II expose functionality to read and write arbitrary physical memory. This could be leveraged by a local attacker to elevate privileges.

item.title: GIGABYTE Multiple Products Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: The GPCIDrv and GDrv low-level drivers in GIGABYTE App Center, AORUS Graphics Engine, XTREME Gaming Engine, and OC GURU II expose functionality to read/write data from/to IO ports. This could be leveraged in a number of ways to ultimately run code with elevated privileges.

item.title: GIGABYTE Multiple Products Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: The GPCIDrv and GDrv low-level drivers in GIGABYTE App Center, AORUS Graphics Engine, XTREME Gaming Engine, and OC GURU expose functionality to read and write arbitrary physical memory. This could be leveraged by a local attacker to elevate privileges.

item.title: Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client for Windows Uncontrolled Search Path Vulnerability
item.description: Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client for Windows allows for incorrect handling of directory paths. An attacker with valid credentials on Windows would be able to copy malicious files to arbitrary locations with system level privileges. This could include DLL pre-loading, DLL hijacking, and other related attacks.

item.title: Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client for Windows DLL Hijacking Vulnerability
item.description: Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client for Windows interprocess communication (IPC) channel allows for insufficient validation of resources that are loaded by the application at run time. An attacker with valid credentials on Windows could execute code on the affected machine with SYSTEM privileges.

item.title: Linux Kernel Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: The overlayfs stacking file system in Linux kernel does not properly validate the application of file capabilities against user namespaces, which could lead to privilege escalation.

item.title: Zimbra Collaboration (ZCS) Arbitrary File Upload Vulnerability
item.description: Zimbra Collaboration (ZCS) allows an attacker to upload arbitrary files using cpio package to gain incorrect access to any other user accounts.

item.title: Microsoft Windows COM+ Event System Service Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Windows COM+ Event System Service contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for privilege escalation.

item.title: Fortinet Multiple Products Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
item.description: Fortinet FortiOS, FortiProxy, and FortiSwitchManager contain an authentication bypass vulnerability that could allow an unauthenticated attacker to perform operations on the administrative interface via specially crafted HTTP or HTTPS requests.

item.title: Atlassian Bitbucket Server and Data Center Command Injection Vulnerability
item.description: Multiple API endpoints of Atlassian Bitbucket Server and Data Center contain a command injection vulnerability where an attacker with access to a public Bitbucket repository, or with read permissions to a private one, can execute code by sending a malicious HTTP request.

item.title: Microsoft Exchange Server Server-Side Request Forgery Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Exchange Server allows for server-side request forgery. Dubbed "ProxyNotShell," this vulnerability is chainable with CVE-2022-41082 which allows for remote code execution.

item.title: Microsoft Exchange Server Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
item.description: Microsoft Exchange Server contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for authenticated remote code execution. Dubbed "ProxyNotShell," this vulnerability is chainable with CVE-2022-41040 which allows for the remote code execution.

item.title: Sophos Firewall Code Injection Vulnerability

item.title: Zoho ManageEngine Multiple Products Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

item.title: Microsoft Windows Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

item.title: Linux Kernel Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
item.description: Linux kernel fails to check all 64 bits of attr.config passed by user space, resulting to out-of-bounds access of the perf_swevent_enabled array in sw_perf_event_destroy(). Explotation allows for privilege escalation.

item.title: Linux Kernel Integer Overflow Vulnerability

item.description: The Code Aurora audio calibration database (acdb) audio driver contains a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability that allows for privilege escalation. Code Aurora is used in third-party products such as Qualcomm and Android.

item.title: Linux Kernel Improper Input Validation Vulnerability
item.description: The get_user and put_user API functions of the Linux kernel fail to validate the target address when being used on ARM v6k/v7 platforms. This allows an application to read and write kernel memory which could lead to privilege escalation.

item.title: Trend Micro Apex One and Apex One as a Service Improper Validation Vulnerability
item.description: Trend Micro Apex One and Apex One as a Service contain an improper validation of rollback mechanism components that could lead to remote code execution.

item.description: Microsoft Windows Common Log File System (CLFS) driver contains an unspecified vulnerability that allows for privilege escalation.

item.title: PEAR Archive_Tar Deserialization of Untrusted Data Vulnerability
item.description: PEAR Archive_Tar allows an unserialization attack because phar: is blocked but PHAR: is not blocked. PEAR stands for PHP Extension and Application Repository and it is an open-source framework and distribution system for reusable PHP components with known usage in third-party products such as Drupal Core and Red Hat Linux.

item.title: PEAR Archive_Tar Improper Link Resolution Vulnerability
item.description: PEAR Archive_Tar Tar.php allows write operations with directory traversal due to inadequate checking of symbolic links. PEAR stands for PHP Extension and Application Repository and it is an open-source framework and distribution system for reusable PHP components with known usage in third-party products such as Drupal Core and Red Hat Linux.

The vulnerability is due to insecure deserialization of user-supplied content by the affected software.
